definition: time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
having elements from another time or place
sense of being in another time and place/feeling that one has entered a time warp

sentences.english: "Eternal Lake of Scented Souls", it is growing the value of time and space highlights the eternal realm.
sentences.chinese: “萬古香魂”，益加凸現價值時空的永恆境界。

sentences.english: The spatial-temporal changes of landscape features were observed in the watershed.
sentences.chinese: 流域內景觀特徵表現出一定的時空變化規律。

sentences.english: It seems that tourists begin a time and space travel and enter another world from there.
sentences.chinese: 遊人彷彿進入時空旅行一般，進入另一個世界。

sentences.english: Yeah, we need to steal a time machine.
sentences.chinese: 那就是啦，我們要去偷時空穿梭機。

sentences.english: Using the air conditioner or defroster may reduce fuel economy.
sentences.chinese: 在發動機未關閉時空踩油門會降低燃油經濟性。

sentences.english: The velocity of light is the ultimate speed limit, being part of the very structure of space and time.
sentences.chinese: 作爲時空結構的一部分，光速是終極速度極限。

sentences.english: Looks a bit like a worm so we call them space-time worms.
sentences.chinese: 看起來有點像蟲子，所以我們稱爲時空蟲。

sentences.english: Analysis of space-time change of land use in Jingyan County.
sentences.chinese: 井研縣土地利用時空變化分析。

sentences.english: The universe is an immense body of mystery mechanism formed by space-time and life.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙是由時空和生命構成的巨大的玄機體。

sentences.english: But could time travel ever be possible in real life?
sentences.chinese: 但時空旅行究竟能否在現實生活中真正實現？

sentences.english: Gatemaster 2000 Casts Master rank Town Portal 1x per day.
sentences.chinese: 神行太保2000每天可施展1次時空之門。

sentences.english: Embrace the wind and float into another time and space.
sentences.chinese: 伴着風，我們飄到了另一個時空和地點。

sentences.english: The control factor of temporal-spatial distribution of SPM in the Changjiang Estuary is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同時亦對懸浮物質的時空分佈的控制因素進行了討論。

sentences.english: In the Autumn of stop to think about revisiting past through time and space.
sentences.chinese: 在秋光中停留，多想穿越時空昔日重遊。

sentences.english: Indeed, a journey through Cairo is a journey through time…
sentences.chinese: 實際上，穿越開羅的旅行是一次能穿越時空的經歷。

sentences.english: Finally, the distribution and evolution of reservoir are analyzed within isochronous stratigraphic frameworks.
sentences.chinese: 最後在等時地層格架內分析了儲層的時空展布。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
